    "maple": [
        "b:= proc(n) option remember; series(`if`(n=0, 1, add(b(n-j)",
        "      *binomial(n-1, j-1)*x*ceil(2^(j-2)), j=1..n)), x, 9)",
        "    end:",
        "a:= n-> coeff(b(n), x, 8):",
